sentences.en: Exploit activate and passivate for transient variables to enable pooling
sentences.cn: 利用激活和钝化瞬态变量来启用池机制

sentences.en: The mechanism of utilizing negative activators to passivate gasification reaction of coke is analyzed.
sentences.cn: 分析和研究了利用负催化剂钝化焦炭气化反应的机理.

trans.tran_en: to render (a metal) less susceptible to corrosion by coating the surface with a substance, such as an oxide
